message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_SAME_CHARACTERISTIC_ALREADY_EXIST_FOR_COMPARTMENT_AT_SAME_TIME_PERIOD
message.locale: The following placement characteristic(s) already exist:%1s from %2d to %3d.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_SAME_CHARACTERISTIC_ALREADY_EXIST_FOR_COMPARTMENT_WITHOUT_END_DATE
message.locale: The following placement characteristic(s) already exist:%1s from %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_ANOTHER_CHARACTERISTIC_ALREADY_EXIST_FOR_COMPARTMENT_AT_SAME_TIME_PERIOD
message.locale: The placement characteristic already exists for the compartment from %1d to %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_ANOTHER_CHARACTERISTIC_ALREADY_EXIST_FOR_COMPARTMENT_WITHOUT_END_DATE
message.locale: The placement characteristic already exists for the compartment from %1d.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_FV_MINIMUM_AGE_MUST_NOT_BE_LESS_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The Minimum Age, %1n, must be greater than or equal to %2n.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XRV_MINIMUM_AGE_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_MAXIMUM_AGE
message.locale: The Minimum Age, %1n, must be less than or equal to the Maximum Age, %2n.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_FV_MAXIMUM_AGE_MUST_NOT_BE_LESS_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The Maximum Age, %1n, must be greater than or equal to %2n.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_ETHINICITY_ONLY_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_ETHIINICITY_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISTIC_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The Same Ethnicity Only may not be selected as Ethnicity Placement Characteristic(s) are selected.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_ETHINICITY_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_COMPARTMENT_HAS_CLIENT_WITH_DIFFERENT_ETHINICITY
message.locale: The Same Ethnicity Only may not be selected as this compartment has more than one client placed with different ethnicities.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_RELIGION_ONLY_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_RELIGION_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISTIC_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The Same Religion Only may not be selected as Religion Placement Characteristic(s) are selected.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_RELIGION_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_COMPARTMENT_HAS_CLIENT_WITH_DIFFERENT_RELIGION
message.locale: The Same Religion Only may not be selected as this compartment has more than one client placed with different religions.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_LANGUAGE_ONLY_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_LANGUAGE_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISTIC_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The Same Language Only may not be selected as Language Placement Characteristic(s) are selected.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_LANGUAGE_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_COMPARTMENT_HAS_CLIENT_WITH_DIFFERENT_LANGUAGE
message.locale: The Same Language Only may not be selected as this compartment has more than one client placed with different languages.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_GANG_ONLY_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_GANG_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISTIC_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The Same Gang Only may not be selected as Gang Affiliation Placement Characteristic(s) are selected.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_GANG_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_COMPARTMENT_HAS_CLIENT_WITH_DIFFERENT_GANG
message.locale: The Same Gang Only may not be selected as this compartment has more than one client placed within it with different gangs.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_GENDER_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_COMPARTMENT_HAS_CLIENT_WITH_DIFFERENT_GENDER
message.locale: The Same Gender Only may not be selected as this compartment has more than one client placed within it with different genders.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XFV_SAME_SERVICE_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_COMPARTMENT_HAS_CLIENT_WITH_DIFFERENT_SERVICE
message.locale: The Same Service Only may not be selected as this compartment has more than one client placed within it availing different services.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XRV_START_DATE_MUST_NOT_BELATER_THAN_END_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XRV_CAN_SELECT_ONLY_ACTIVE_SERVICE_OFFERING
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not Active, it cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XRV_LANGUAGE_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: The following Language(s), %1s already exist for this placement characteristic.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XRV_GANG_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: The following Gang(s), %1s already exist for this placement characteristic.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XRV_ETHINICITY_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: The following Ethnicity(s), %1s already exist for this placement characteristic.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISITIC_XRV_RELIGION_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: The following Religion(s), %1s already exist for this placement characteristic.
